name: Farm Legends
description:
You've heard of overcooked, you might've even heard of Harvest Moon, but have you ever heard of Tomagatchi meets OVERCOOKED and HARVEST MOON?

I THINK NOT.

Dive deep into an adventure of farming. Save your friends from the monsters that have been told in tales.
